title: Peloton ditches Apple Watch integration in new video game mode Lanebreak
content:
Peloton’s newly released video game mode, Lanebreak, ditches the Gym Kit integration that allows the Apple Watch to connect with the Peloton Bike+.

more…

The post Peloton ditches Apple Watch integration in new video game mode Lanebreak appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Peloton's video game mode, Lanebreak, ditches the Gym Kit integration that allows the Apple Watch to connect to the Peloton Bike+
